UCARE: Understanding CARdiac Events in Breast Cancer – Pilot Cardio-Oncology Assessment and Surveillance Pathway for Breast Cancer Patients

Inclusion: Women aged ≥ 18 years Ability to read and understand English Breast Cancer Stage I- III planned to receive systemic chemotherapy || Exclusion: Patients not for systemic chemotherapy with curative intent Patients who are unable to co-operate with the study protocol Patients who are unable to give informed consent Show less Study Population Adult female patients diagnosed with stage I-III breast cancer receiving chemotherapy. Gender-based Eligibility Yes Gender Eligibility for Study Female Ages Eligible for Study 18 Years to 90 Years ( Adult , Older Adult ) Sexes Eligible for Study Female Accepts Healthy Volunteers No Sampling Method Probability Sample
